WRITING.TEXT:
The article is well written and worth a full read. The whole situation is a bit more complicated than it seems, because there are multiple lawsuits from both sides going on. This is the most important information:
The Mandels were acting as both lawyers and business managers. Because they offered legal assistance, he says, they were bound by a California law forbidding attorneys from taking a percentage of clients' earnings unless they have a contract expressly allowing them to do so.
The TL; DR would be: His Managers managed his finances and legal stuff for years without a problem, they get a certain cut of his income. Depp has a lavish lifestyle and around 2008 he is about to default because of this. They give him a "lifeline" loan and he can continue with his lifestyle. His Managers allegedly told him multiple times over the years to change his spending behaviour, he doesn't listen.

Falls man Welt.de Klicks vermeiden mchte:
Sehr geehrter Herr Staatsprsident,
bitte sehen Sie mir nach, dass ich mich auf diesem Weg an Sie wende. Sie zu erreichen, ist mir ein groes Anliegen. Mein Name ist Ulf Poschardt. Ich bin Chefredakteur der Welt. Deniz Ycel ist unser Trkei-Korrespondent, und ich mache mir groe Sorge um ihn, der seit ber einer Woche in Untersuchungshaft sitzt.
Als ich Deniz vor zwei Jahren traf, um ihn zu unserer Zeitung zu holen, wollten wir beide, dass er ber Innenpolitik schreibt. Bis wir anfingen, ber die Trkei zu sprechen und die Menschen, die dort leben. Mir wurde klar, wie sehr Deniz das Land seiner Mtter und Vter liebt. Deswegen ging er fr uns in die Trkei. Er schaffte es, mit seinen Reportagen und Analysen in unseren Zeitungen und online zigtausende Menschen, die von Kultur und Tradition der Trkei wenig wussten, fr Ihr Land zu interessieren. Seit Deniz ber die Trkei schreibt, hat sich das Interesse an der Berichterstattung mehr als verdoppelt.
Mein Vater war als bayerischer Beamter Ende der 80er-Jahre im Finanzministerium in Ankara, um bei der Modernisierung der trkischen Steuerverwaltung mitzuhelfen. Er erzhlt noch heute von dem unglaublichen Flei und dem Engagement der Kollegen, die auch am Samstagnachmittag noch selbstverstndlich im Ministerium arbeiteten. Er war beeindruckt, dass bereits um 1989 viele Frauen auf wichtigen Positionen im Ministerium saen. Legendr auch die Fuballbegeisterung der trkischen Kollegen, die eine Sitzung verschoben, weil vier trkische Mannschaften in der ersten Runde des Europapokals spielten. Und nie mehr hat er so ein gutes Tursu bekommen wie bei den Kollegen, die ihn regelmig zum Essen einluden.
Meinen Shnen zeige ich im Museum, dass jener Landstrich, wo heute die Trkei liegt, eine Wiege unser Kultur, Sprache und der Architektur ist. Ich glaube, die Trkei und Deutschland verbindet viel. Nicht nur Millionen von Bundesbrgern mit trkischen Wurzeln, die hufig wie Deniz die doppelte Staatsbrgerschaft besitzen, sondern auch eine wechselvolle Geschichte, in der es beiden Seiten am besten ging, wenn gemeinsame Interessen gewrdigt und gepflegt wurden. Das augenblickliche Verhltnis spiegelt nicht wider, was unsere beiden Lnder verbindet. Sie knnen das ndern. Sie vor allem.
Die Freilassung von Deniz Ycel wre ein Signal.
Im Mrz 1999 traten Sie eine Haftstrafe an, weil der politische Gegner Sie dort am besten aufgehoben sah. Sie wissen also, was eine solche Strafe bedeutet.
Deniz Ycel ist Journalist, ein kritischer und unbequemer. Nicht mehr und nicht weniger. Bitte lassen Sie ihn frei. Deniz hat sich freiwillig gestellt und vertraut auf ein rechtstaatliches, faires Verfahren in Ihrem Land. Er arbeitet mit den ermittelnden Behrden zusammen.
Zu den Sulen Ihrer Religion gehrt der Koran. In einer der schnsten Suren, der 55., wird erzhlt, wie Gott, der Barmherzige, die Welt erschaffen hat: Zuerst schuf er den Menschen, dann den Himmel mit der Sonne und den Sternen und schlielich die Waage, die fortan fr Gerechtigkeit unter den Menschen sorgen sollte. Wenn ihr ber Menschen richtet, das fordert Gott von seinen Glubigen, dann urteilt mit Gerechtigkeit.
Ich freue mich, von Ihnen zu hren.
Hochachtungsvoll,
Ulf Poschardt

WRITING.TITLE: Oculus + Multiple Screens [R9 390]
WRITING.TEXT:
Hey Guys,
CV1 Owner (+PC noob) here and I got some problems with connecting my Rift with my Computer. I have a AMD R9 390 with the following / usual setup:
* HDMI - Goes to my receiver for A/V (TV as second Monitor + Surround Audio System) * DVI 1 - Goes to my Monitor * DVI 2 - Not used * DP - Not used
When I got my Oculus last week, I just used the HDMI slot on my PC and everything worked fine. Then i read somewhere that I can use a HDMI-to-DVI Adapter for the Video Signal to the Rift. I searched on this subreddit for this problem and found some solution, so I ordered [this](https://www.amazon.de/gp/product/B00ZMVGTA2/ref=oh_aui_detailpage_o00_s00?ie=UTF8 psc=1) and connected everything, but I only got a black screen on the Rift. I switched to the second DVI, same result. I dont want to change HDMI cables every time I want to play with my Rift. Now I'm a bit lost:
1. Is this the wrong HDMI/DVI Adapter? 2. Should I try to connect my Monitor with the DP Port, so that not both of the DVI ports are used at the same time? 3. Are there any options I just forgot to activate? 4. Are there any other viable solutions (I've read about HDMI splitter. . . )?
Thanks so much,
Karu

Well as I said, if you are really just level 47, go for some normal nodes on your level. Level to 50 and do the DoL Quests (btw starting these Quests give you EXP+ Consumables, quite handy to level up!
Once you reach 56+ you can experiment with your Collectable rotation, but before 50 I wouldnt even think about that ;)

If I recall correctly you "just" have to hand in HQs of Adamantite Ore and Chrysal Greens , right? Well thats just luck based, you should be somewhere between 7-15% HQ Chance, just keep on gathering them and you will get HQs :) Perception+ Food and Gear obviously helps to quicken this process.

I would advice just gathering normal nodes for quantity and going for the scripts later, that's how I did it. Will take you 3-4 days to reach 60. Dont forget the daily HQ GC Hand-In fr max EXP. Also the L Leves give some nice exp depending on the item. Leveling DoL is not hard atm just a bit time consuming. Your Roation is the normal starting one, so you must be lacking Perception to reach the wanted Rarity.
Just level up your Botanist, with better gear and stats you will have a better outcome.

Hey there,
Plain simple: you are not high enough with 47. To get some good results you should be 56+. Just try to level your DoL with the new collectable system, it doesn't take so much time :)
For the gear, well at this moment we don't actually need the HQ 60 gear (Penta Meld), but at some point in the future there will be new nodes, which will require higher stats. I would advise you to get the Set with Blue Gathering Scripts, they are a good alternative for people with limited budget.

Shadow Walker is great to start with on the MT imo and Smoke Bomb can help if some DPS decide to burst the shit out of the boss (looking at you BLM). I find both quite interesting for raiding, but we have to see how it applies to Savage as we don't have any "real" raid atm.
On Topic: MNK still (can) do insane amount of DPS over a period of time and NIN is very viable for the whole team (great DPS output, TP/Hate/DPS management.

WRITING.TITLE: [Idee] Die groe Starcraft Show
WRITING.TEXT:
Aloha liebe Bohnen,
Nach nun einigen Wochen *Straight to Gold* ist mir aufgefallen, wie gerne ich eigentlich Starcraft 2 Content gucke und gerade das Triumvirat aus Budi, Simon und Honor ist genial. Ich wrde gerne mehr SC2 von den Bohnen am Stck sehen, kann aber auch nachvollziehen, dass man nach 2 Stunden 2v2 Ladder ziemlich fertig ist als nicht-pro. Dehalb hier meine Idee fr eine Abendfllende Starcraft Show in drei Teilen:
1. Teil - Straight to Gold 2. Teil - FFA 3. Teil - Arcade Games
FFA bedeutet *Free For All* und ist quasi ein Modus mit 8 Spielern, Jeder gegen Jeden. Gerade das knnte super unterhaltsam sein, da es nur um Spa geht und man keine "richtigen" Skill unbedingt bentigt. Knnte mir gerade da gut vorstellen auch einen Eddy und Nils mitreinzupacken oder ein paar Leute aus der Community (Uschi und co.). Ich kann mich noch erinnern, dass FFA zu WoL Zeiten oft am Ende eines Tunieres fr die Zuschauer gespielt wurde und es war eigentlich immer super unterhaltsam zu schauen (Mass Nukes, spontane Teams und Verrat etc.). Hier ein [Beispiel](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kMsjUkeWuf4).
Arcade Modus erklrt sich von Selbst, viele verschiedene Mini Games, die Auswahl ist recht gro, kenne mich aber nicht so gut aus, vielleicht kann jemand aus der Community helfen mit Vorschlgen?
Was haltet ihr von meiner Idee?

Well as I said, if you know when the first golem hits the battlefield you should have your Twin Snake Buff and IR up + your off GCD's. Also try to hit the mob at the right position (flank back). In terms off PB, I dont use it there . . . But im the kind of MNK who rarely uses PB in my normal rotation, I only use it to save my GL stacks, when the boss is disappearing and for the first ghost add to burst the bosses HP to 47%.

Main MNK here, beaten T9 5+ times now (ilvl 107). Yes the T9 golems should be handled quickly, don't rely on your Dots there. Dont be fooled, even your best rotation cant do the job if one dps is dead at the beginning of this phase (we kill the green always before he changes color).
As a general advice for playing MNK:
You can do the theorycraft all day long and have the best rotation etc but I find two things more important:
Knowing the fight and the timing of phase changes (thinking ahead!)
Reaction to unusual stuff (dps too fast/slow, multiple deads)
IMO MNK is one of the best DPS classes, because of his consistent and steady DPS output + some decent burst DMG.If you stay alive and know what comes ahead your DPS output will be with the top.

What I never understood in this whole discussion is the notion of intolerance. Sure I understand people got frustrated with claiming NM's in FFXI, but what harm would it bring to implement a few NMs in FFXIV? There is always this very loud group of people condemning NMs, but why not just ignore it and let the people, who enjoy them be. Yes FFXIV needs something on the Overworld, call it Treasure Hunts or whatever, give me an incentive to travel, explore fight with my friends. Give me gear options, give me danger and excitement.
In the end this is a call for more horizontal progression / not instanced challenging content.

WRITING.TITLE: HNM's in FFXIV [Forum Post - Not My Idea]

WRITING.TEXT: Its a timing thing as always. Person with yellow marker stands in the ass of the boss mob, waits till it is about to turn and then runs through it. If there is no patch underneath you will get stunned, if there is you can run through with minimal dmg. Two bad things can happen: Either you are too fast going through the boss (before he is turning), then your tanks get eaten or you are too slow and you are getting eaten. But trust me, everyone can do it, its a matter of a few seconds, just try it out!
Yep do it like that and with enough DPS output you'll just burn through it with one honey, we had it yesterday :)

WRITING.TEXT: Well i think its the same time (90s, 360s), since you need 4 logs for a plank. But I use them because, they are unlimited, bright and long burning.

Well i will try to answer some question.
* Try to find a couple of recipes which suit your base setup (e.g. cooking with monster meat and honey etc) * My trips are usually 1-2 days long, depending on the goal i want to achieve. * Try to think about, what you really need on your trip. Sticks flint for more tools, logs and grass for a fire, a weapon amor and food. * Try to think in seasons. what do i need to survive the winter, what can i accomplish in the rest of that time window. For example, you need wood for the winter to burn. Take one whole day and chop wood, refine it into planks and store it. Or try to start a field of grass/sticks/berry in your base. * Stone walls are quit useful for a panic room :D
Well i try to do stuff that you always have to do, like chopping some near wood or cooking stuff and storing it.

Yeah i saw the Shining Code 2.0 and the Making of, realy interesting stuff. I saw a very good british dokumentary about Kubricks way of working called "Stanleys Boxes", its even more facinating, because he stored every detail (of his films, made and unmade) over decades in thousands of boxes. There are costume tests for clockwork orange, where he seeks the ultimate evil hat and camera tests for lolita. Beautiful, never before seen footage! Sry if my English is bad, not my nativ language.

I think you are absolutly right, i was disappointed too, because i expected more of it. In the End nothing was new for me, because im an avid Kubrick fan, ive saw the Shining Code and read the Ager Reviews alot.
Room 237 knows that there is no finite answer to The Shining ( I searched for the Face too!). But when you look at Kubricks other Films, you will notice that he made nearly no mistakes, he was a master of subtle things. I dont want to say, that he was responsible for the moon landing, and thats the message in Shining, all i want to say is, Kubrick was a highly intelligent Human being and he knew People would search for answers in his films. In my mind he is the perfect troll ;)
